22 -def detectType(value): 

23      if isinstance(value, str): 
24          return 'String' 
25      elif isinstance(value, int): 
26          return 'Number' 
27      elif isinstance(value, ByteReader): 
28          return 'Binary' 
29      else: 
30          raise Exception('could not detect message type')

43          self.settings['variant'] = DATA_TYPES.index(typeName)

63 -class _BinaryMessageMixin(_DataTypeMixin): 

64      isObject = False 

65 -    def readMessage(self, data): 

66          dataType = self.getDataType() 
67          if dataType == 'Number': 
68              self.value, = INT_DATA.unpack_from(data) 
69          elif dataType == 'Binary':
